page.title: 10WINN FARM - THE PEOPLE
page.content: Interview with the family 24/7/85 This farm is owner-occupied by Mr.Bradbury, his wife and 2 sons who both work on the farm. At busy times they also employ a contract labourer, especially when they are busy silage making. Their main outside contact is by telephone. The family also have a television and video which is their main source of entertainment. Mrs. Bradbury is a committee member of the Kniveton Women's Institute. Mr. Bradbury seldom leaves the farm, except for the occasional whist drive, about four times a year,at a neighbouring village. He also attends the National Farmers' Union and Grassland Meetings. The family also go to Agricultural Shows at Ashover and Ashbourne. They have one week's holiday each year.
